title: Soul Storm: The Connecting Flame
description: This edition published by Dark Roast Press is no longer available. A new revised edition will be released through Silver Publishing at the beginning of 2012 .Cursed with a Blood-Rage by an unknown God, a warrior named Thaddeus travels the world in search of the one who can end his torment. But when strange and terrifying dreams call him back to his past where demons dwell and sorrow bleeds, what he finds may be the key to his salvation rather than his destruction.A long time ago a dying child prince named Stephen played for Thaddeus on his harp, leaving a beautiful memory in his heart and soul that served to guide him through future heartbreak. Now, eight years later, Thaddeus finds that Prince Stephen is still alive, but may not be for long, as he is also a target of the Gods, charged with treason against the Aggregate and sentenced to die. Will Thaddeus find what he needs within himself to keep the Gods from killing yet another person he loves?
author: Myristica
